idea-plugin.name: Twitch Chat
idea-plugin.description: A simple chat plugin for the streaming service, Twitch.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 1.2.0
  • Updated project to be compatible with IntelliJ 2016.1.
Version 1.1.0

Mainly working on the build side of things. These changes don't affect anything on the user side.

  • Will now be using the axion-release-plugin to track current version.
  • The project's license is now Apache 2.0.
  • Using CircleCI to ensure that project builds. Eventually, will be deploying using this CI.
Version 1.0
  • First release! Nothing really crazy here.
